companies.summary: Concrete cutting and coring. Jarrad's primary cash cow.
companies.name: kippen-concrete
keyFacts: 2026 highway pipeline worth $3.5M starting March
Approximately 30-35 employees
Gross revenue approximately $5M

companies.name: kippen-excavation
keyFacts: First IOS yard under contract: West Haven, UT @ $280K, closing end of Feb 2026
IOS yard partnership: 50/50 property with Shane, 53/47 business (Jarrad majority)
Approximately 8 employees
Gross revenue approximately $2M

companies.summary: Diamond tool distribution. 3 new partners. Must service $1.2M debt.
companies.name: dmi-tools
keyFacts: True 2025 revenue: $946K (not $1.5M — $570K was intercompany transfers double-counted)
Real 2025 margin: -7.6% (losing money)
3 new partners: Ian (Oregon), Mr. Wu (Chinese), Swedish engineer
Sales Maker live at dmisalesweb-production.up.railway.app, Steven Lin developing
World of Concrete 2026 booth investment ~$40-50K

companies.summary: Holds $1.2M DMI debt. Not an operating company.
companies.name: roc-diamond
keyFacts: Roc Diamond LLC is Jarrad's personal holding company for debt from original diamond tool business
Holds ~$1.2M in debt: EIDL loan + Zions Bank equipment loan
DMI Tools Corp services this debt via lease payments to Roc Diamond
Will persist as debt-holding entity after DMI restructuring (DMI Tools LLC dissolved, ops move to DMI Tools Corp)
CRITICAL: Must combine ROC Diamond + DMI Tools financials to get true picture of DMI business health

companies.name: kippen-leasing
keyFacts: Leasing entity in Jarrad's business portfolio

companies.summary: FSM software for concrete cutting. In development.
companies.name: sawdot-city
keyFacts: FSM software for concrete cutters, in development
2 developers working on it
Also building B2B marketplace for concrete cutters

alerts.message: IOS yard under contract, closing Feb
